scripts.dev: echo 'WARNING: must run `npm run dev:durable_objects` and `npm run dev:durable_objects:watch` in separate terminals' && npm run build && wrangler pages dev --compatibility-date 2023-02-11 --binding NODE_ENV=development SENDGRID_LOGIN=$SENDGRID_LOGIN TESTING_OVERRIDE_CODE=$TESTING_OVERRIDE_CODE DEBUG="blueprint:*" DEBUG_COLORS=1 --do DO_API=DurableAPI@transformation-durable_objects --kv SESSIONS --proxy 3000 -- vite --host
scripts.build: npm run build:version.json && npm run build:durable_objects && npm run build:ui
scripts.start:pages: env BROWSER=none wrangler pages dev --compatibility-date 2023-02-11 --binding NODE_ENV=development SENDGRID_LOGIN=$SENDGRID_LOGIN TESTING_OVERRIDE_CODE=$TESTING_OVERRIDE_CODE DEBUG="blueprint:*" DEBUG_COLORS=1 --do DO_API=DurableAPI@transformation-durable_objects --kv SESSIONS --proxy 3001 -- vite preview --host
scripts.build-and-start: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.build-and-start:pages: npm run build:version.json && npm run build:ui && npm run start:pages
scripts.build-and-start:durable_objects: npm run build:durable_objects && npm run start:durable_objects
scripts.test: npm run build-and-start & npm run delay-and-cypress-run
scripts.coverage:build: npm run build:durable_objects && npx vite build --config vite-coverage.config.js
scripts.coverage:build-and-start: npm run coverage:build && npm run start
scripts.coverage: npm run coverage:c8 && npm run coverage:nyc
